_comment: South Korea compliance norms and standards database. Includes KC Mark, KCC, K-MEPS, RRA and other Korean regulatory requirements. Updated for 2025 compliance requirements.

norms.name: Korea Certification Mark
norms.applies_to: Electrical and electronic products, children's products, lifestyle products
norms.description: Mandatory safety certification for products sold in South Korea. Replaces previous EK mark. Self-certification or third-party certification depending on product category. Covers electrical appliances, IT equipment, children's products.

norms.name: KC EMC Certification
norms.applies_to: Electrical and electronic products generating electromagnetic interference
norms.description: EMC certification required for products that may cause electromagnetic interference. Class A (industrial/commercial) and Class B (residential). Testing at accredited labs. KC mark with EMC designation.

norms.name: Korea Communications Commission - Radio Equipment Certification
norms.applies_to: All radio transmitting equipment including WiFi, Bluetooth, cellular devices
norms.description: Mandatory certification for radio equipment. Testing by accredited labs (RRA-designated). Equipment Certification (for mass production) or Interim Certification (for R&D). KCC mark required on product.

norms.name: Radio Research Agency Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for radio and telecommunications equipment. RRA conducts testing or designates testing labs. Approval number must be displayed on product. Part of KCC certification process.

norms.name: Korea Minimum Energy Performance Standards
norms.applies_to: Energy-consuming products including electronics, appliances, lighting
norms.description: Mandatory minimum energy efficiency standards. Products must meet MEPS before sale. Covers over 30 product categories. Administered by KEMCO (Korea Energy Management Corporation).

norms.name: Korea Energy Efficiency Label and Rating
norms.description: Mandatory energy efficiency labeling. 5-grade system (Grade 1 most efficient). Required for products in scope. Registration with KEMCO. Label shows energy consumption and efficiency grade.

norms.name: Energy Standby Power Program
norms.description: Voluntary program for standby power reduction. Products meeting criteria can display e-Standby logo. Increasingly important for consumer electronics and appliances.

norms.name: Audio/Video, ICT Equipment - Safety (Korean Standard)
norms.description: Korean adoption of IEC 62368-1. Hazard-based safety standard for ICT equipment. Used for KC certification of IT products. Replaces KS C IEC 60950-1.

norms.name: Household Appliances - Safety - General Requirements
norms.description: Korean adoption of IEC 60335-1. General safety requirements for household appliances. Used for KC certification. Part of comprehensive KS C 60335 series.

norms.name: Information Technology Equipment - Safety
norms.description: Korean safety standard for IT equipment. Based on international standards but with Korean requirements. Used for KC certification compliance.

norms.name: Lithium Batteries - Safety Requirements
norms.description: Korean adoption of IEC 62133-2. Safety requirements for portable lithium batteries. Required for KC certification of battery products.

norms.name: Multimedia Equipment - EMC Emission Requirements
norms.description: Korean adoption of CISPR 32. EMC emission requirements for multimedia equipment. Used for KC EMC certification.

norms.name: Act on Resource Circulation of Electrical and Electronic Equipment
norms.description: Korean RoHS restricting hazardous substances. Similar to EU RoHS. Limits for lead, mercury, cadmium, hexavalent chromium, PBBs, PBDEs. Compliance required for EEE.

norms.name: Extended Producer Responsibility for EEE
norms.description: Producer responsibility for recycling and disposal of EEE. Registration and reporting requirements. Recycling fee system. Similar to EU WEEE.

norms.name: Korea Environmental Technology and Industry Support Act - Green Certification
norms.description: Voluntary environmental certification. Green product certification mark. Demonstrates reduced environmental impact. Increasingly important for government procurement.

norms.name: Ministry of Food and Drug Safety - Medical Device Approval
norms.description: Medical device approval and registration. Classification I-IV based on risk. Pre-market approval for Classes II-IV. QMS requirements similar to ISO 13485. Manufacturer registration required.

norms.name: Korea Good Manufacturing Practice for Medical Devices
norms.description: Korean GMP requirements for medical device manufacturing. Based on ISO 13485 with Korean requirements. Facility inspection and certification. Required for medical device registration.

norms.name: Medical Device Clinical Trial Approval
norms.description: Clinical trial approval process for medical devices. MFDS review and approval required before conducting trials. GCP compliance. Required for innovative or high-risk devices.

norms.name: Safety Requirements for Children's Products
norms.description: Mandatory safety requirements for toys and children's products. KC certification required. Testing for mechanical hazards, chemical substances, flammability. Based on international standards with Korean requirements.

norms.name: Safety of Toys (Korean Standard)
norms.description: Korean adoption of ISO 8124. Toy safety standard covering mechanical properties, flammability, migration of elements. Used for KC certification of toys.

norms.name: Act on Registration and Evaluation of Chemical Substances (K-REACH)
norms.applies_to: Chemical substances and products containing chemicals
norms.description: Korean chemical registration system similar to EU REACH. Registration requirements for chemical substances. Notification for products. Restrictions on hazardous chemicals. Administered by ME and NIER.

norms.name: Chemicals Control Act - Toxic Chemicals Management
norms.applies_to: Products containing toxic or restricted chemicals
norms.description: Regulation of toxic chemicals. Prohibited substances, restricted substances, toxic substance management. Affects product materials and labeling. Safety data sheet requirements.

norms.name: Act on Safety Control of Biocidal Products
norms.description: Approval system for biocidal products. Pre-market approval required. Efficacy and safety testing. Labeling requirements. Affects antimicrobial products.

norms.name: Ministry of Land, Infrastructure and Transport - Vehicle Type Approval
norms.description: Type approval for vehicles sold in Korea. Safety standards, emissions requirements. Self-certification for some components. Harmonization with international standards but Korean-specific requirements.

norms.name: Motor Vehicle Safety Standards (KMVSS)
norms.description: Korean motor vehicle safety standards. Similar to UN ECE regulations and other international standards. Covers safety systems, lighting, emissions, construction.

norms.name: Vehicle Emissions Standards
norms.description: Emissions standards for vehicles. Progressively stricter requirements. Harmonized with Euro standards but Korean testing cycles. Diesel emissions testing post-VW scandal.

norms.name: Food Sanitation Act - Food Contact Materials
norms.applies_to: Materials and articles in contact with food
norms.description: Safety requirements for food contact materials. Standards for various materials (plastics, metals, ceramics, paper). Migration testing. Positive lists for certain materials. MFDS enforcement.

norms.name: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points
norms.description: Mandatory HACCP for certain food categories. Voluntary for others. Facility certification. Not directly for products but affects food contact equipment and packaging.

norms.name: KC Certification for Construction Materials
norms.description: KC certification for construction materials including electrical materials, fire protection, structural materials. Performance and safety testing. Required for building installation.

norms.name: Fire Safety Certification for Products
norms.description: Mandatory fire safety certification for certain products (fire extinguishers, fire detectors, emergency lighting, etc.). Testing at approved labs. NFA (National Fire Agency) certification mark.

norms.name: PIPA - Personal Information Protection
norms.description: Korean data protection law. Consent requirements, data subject rights, security measures, breach notification. Similar to GDPR but with Korean characteristics. PIPC enforcement. Applies to connected devices and services.

norms.name: Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection
norms.description: Privacy and security requirements for information and communications services. Data retention limits, location data protection, online privacy. Complements PIPA.

norms.name: Credit Information Use and Protection Act
norms.description: Protection of credit information and personal financial data. Requirements for financial data processing. Affects fintech products and services.

norms.name: ISMS-P Certification
norms.description: Information Security Management System with Personal information protection (ISMS-P). Mandatory for certain service providers (telecom, large platforms). Voluntary for others. Annual audit required.

norms.name: Common Criteria Certification (Korean Scheme)
norms.description: Korean Common Criteria certification scheme. Required for some government procurement. Mutual recognition with other CC schemes. KISA operates evaluation facilities.

norms.name: Cryptographic Module Validation Program
norms.description: Validation of cryptographic modules. Required for government and financial sector. Similar to FIPS 140. KISA operates validation program.

norms.name: Quality Management Systems (Korean Standard)
norms.description: Korean adoption of ISO 9001. Quality management system certification. KAB (Korea Accreditation Board) accredits certification bodies.

norms.name: Environmental Management Systems (Korean Standard)
norms.description: Korean adoption of ISO 14001. Environmental management system certification. Increasingly required for suppliers to major Korean corporations.

norms.name: Information Security Management Systems (Korean Standard)
norms.description: Korean adoption of ISO/IEC 27001. Information security management certification. Important for IT products and services. KAB accreditation.

norms.name: Monopoly Regulation and Fair Trade Act
norms.description: Prohibits unfair trade practices and misleading advertising. Product labeling requirements. Consumer protection provisions. KFTC (Korea Fair Trade Commission) enforcement.

norms.name: Framework Act on Consumers
norms.description: Consumer rights framework. Product safety, recall procedures, consumer information. Defective product liability. Complements specific product safety laws.

norms.name: Product Liability Act
norms.description: Strict liability for defective products. No-fault liability for manufacturers and importers. Similar to EU and US product liability laws. Important for product design and safety.

norms.name: Act on Promotion of Saving and Recycling of Resources - Packaging
norms.description: Extended producer responsibility for packaging. Packaging waste reduction and recycling. Standards for packaging materials. Excess packaging prohibited.

norms.name: Korea Environmental Industry & Technology Institute - Eco-Label
norms.description: Voluntary environmental labeling program. Type I eco-label (ISO 14024). Criteria for various product categories. Demonstrates reduced environmental impact throughout lifecycle.

norms.name: Carbon Footprint Certification and Low Carbon Product Certification
norms.description: Carbon footprint labeling program. Quantifies and communicates product carbon footprint. Low carbon product certification for products reducing emissions. Voluntary but growing.

norms.name: Good Recycled Mark
norms.description: Certification for products using recycled materials. Minimum recycled content requirements. Promotes circular economy. Government procurement preference.

norms.name: Electrical Appliances and Consumer Products Safety Control Act
norms.description: Legal framework for electrical product safety. Defines mandatory certification (KC), self-declaration, supplier's declaration. Penalties for non-compliance. Market surveillance authority.

norms.name: Radio Waves Act
norms.description: Legal framework for radio equipment regulation. Frequency allocation, technical standards, certification requirements. RRA and KCC authority. Penalties for unauthorized equipment.
